description: A simple action converts the Magic Rope Bag from a freestanding rope bag to a mat for sitting on.

values: Drawstring system makes the Magic free standing or flat for storage
Normal carrying handle and XL handle for over the shoulder carrying
Internal strap to organize climbing rack
